snippet.title: Mr. Death: The Violent Silence 4K Cinematic Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
(Original Announcement Date: 6/6/24)

Mr. Death: The Violent Silence is a Terrifying Thriller where you take place as a detective named Sebastian Moonshade in the open world of Woodcarve Town. Your mission is to investigate the murders of the killer Vincent Crowfield whilst playing against his state-of-the-art AI that learns from your actions that will do ANYTHING to stop you from finding out his secrets.


Mr. Death: The Violent Silence™ ©2020-2024 Zyconyme Studios & Jason LM Matthews

Mr. Death: The Violent Silence, its logo, the source code, all its characters, their distinctive likenesses, and all related elements are trademarks and material protected by copyright of Jason LM Matthews ©2020-2024 All rights reserved
